title: Episode 116: Robin Williams, Mark Driscoll, Michael Gungor, and More!
description: Phil has some thoughts about Robin Williams, plus the gang covers news stories suggested by listeners and responds to listener mail about the Mark Driscoll/Michael Gungor brouhaha!
